SystemTable.name: character_sets
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `character_sets` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `character_set_name` varchar(32) not null, `default_collate_name` varchar(32) not null, `description` varchar(60) default null, `maxlen` bigint(3) not null default '0', primary key(`id`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: collations
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `collations` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `collation_name` varchar(32) not null, `character_set_name` varchar(32) not null, `is_default` varchar(3) default null, `is_compiled` varchar(3) not null, `sortlen` bigint(3) not null default '0', primary key(`id`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: collation_character_set_applicability
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `collation_character_set_applicability` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `collation_name` varchar(32) not null, `character_set_name` varchar(32) not null, primary key(`id`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: engines
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `engines` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `engine` varchar(64) not null, `support` varchar(8) not null, `comment` varchar(80) default null, `transactions` varchar(3) default null, `xa` varchar(3) default null, `savepoints` varchar(3) default null, primary key(`id`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: global_variables
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `global_variables` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `variable_name` varchar(64) not null, `variable_value` varchar(1024) default null, primary key(`id`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: session_variables
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `session_variables` ( `id` bigint unsigned not null auto_increment, `variable_name` varchar(64) not null, `variable_value` varchar(1024) default null, primary key(`id`) ) charset=utf8

SystemTable.name: user_defined_java_code
SystemTable.Create: create table if not exists `user_defined_java_code` ( `func_name` varchar(100) not null, `class_name` varchar(100) not null, `code` text not null, `code_language` varchar(100) not null, `input_types` varchar(200) not null, `result_type` varchar(100) not null, primary key(`func_name`) ) charset=utf8
